message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can we meet in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate you coming up, however,  $10,000 is still quite a bit below what I'm looking for.  Could you consider $13,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,500 is still out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
